title: Papa! Papa! Suki! Suki! Chou Chou Aishiteru
original_name: パパ！パパ！好き！好き！超超愛してる
sinopse: Natsume Konoha left his job in the publishing house and returned with his daughters to his hometown to spend more time with family. In addition to the fact that one of his daughters had a father complex and the other reached a rebellious period, now he has become the manager of a female dormitory with rather unusual residents.
